data: Go to singaporefi r/singaporefi • Pleasant_Porpoise Anyone here switched from MNC to Government job? How was your experience and career progression after? Hi all, I’m currently working in the private sector (MNC, finance-related role) and considering a move to the public sector. I’d like to hear from those who’ve made a similar switch — how was the transition in terms of work culture, pace, and growth? Also, after spending a few years in the government, is it difficult to move back to the private sector (especially MNCs)? Would appreciate any honest insights on pros/cons, career impact, and whether you’d make the switch again if given the choice. Read more Share
